Container.Name: XBMC-Headless (gothma)
Container.Description: A Headless docker of XBMC (gotham-13.2)[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/root/.xbmc[/b] : this path is used to store the config files for XBMC-Headless.[br] The following variables need to be set to work with a MYSQL install[br] MYSQLip :- IP address of your mysql installation [b]YOU MUST USE IP ADDRESS AND NOT HOST NAME
